page.title: 17GOVERNMENT HALWELL&MORELEIGH
page.content: The villages of Halwell and Moreleigh are served firstly by a Parish Council,an elected but voluntary body. All Planning Applications for the Parishes are forwarded by the District Council for their recommendations based on local knowledge. Their other prime function is to act as a clearing house for complaints. Secondly comes the South Hams District Council - responsible for council housing, housing benefits,rate and rent rebates,mortgages,building controls,public health,refuse collection, pest control and grant aid for social,cultural and sporting activities. Third in line is Devon County Council - responsible for public transport, education,social services, highway maintenance and the library services. The South Hams return an M.P.
